modules.description: Encodes binary data into hexadecimal strings and decodes hexadecimal strings back into binary data. It operates on byte sequences and strings, handling both direct and chunked input. Used to prepare binary data for safe transmission over text-based protocols or to interpret raw data from hexadecimal logs.

Encodes and decodes strings between hexadecimal and ASCII representations, converting each byte to two hex digits or parsing two hex digits into a byte. Operates on strings and characters, using base-16 encoding rules. Converts "abc" to "616263" and "616263" back to "abc".
